org.jvoicexml
Interface RemoteConnectable

All Known Subinterfaces:
CallControl, CharacterInput, ExternalResource, SpokenInput, SystemOutput, UserInput
All Known Implementing Classes:
AudioInput, AudioOutput, BufferedCharacterInput, CharacterInputStub, DummyCallControl
public interface RemoteConnectable

Objects that implement this interface can be connected to a RemoteClient.

Since:
0.5.5

Copyright © 2006 JVoiceXML group - http://jvoicexml.sourceforge.net/

Version:
$Revision:161 $
Author:
Dirk Schnelle

Method Summary
 void connect(RemoteClient client)
          Establishes a connection from the given RemoteClient to this object.
 

Method Detail

connect

void connect(RemoteClient client)
             throws IOException
Establishes a connection from the given RemoteClient to this object.

Parameters:
client - data container with connection relevant data.
Throws:
IOException - error establishing the connection.
